column2: Red Prophet: The Tales of Alvin Maker (2006) #11
column6:
The Prophet has established the land west of the "Mizzipy" as Red man's land. Meanwhile, Governor Harrison and his soldiers must endure a terrible curse until they confess to the murder of the Prophetstown Indians to every stranger that comes their way!,2007,12
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Simon Bowland | writer:Roland Bernard Brown | writer:Orson Scott Card | penciller (cover):Rodney Buchemi | colorist:Miguel Montenegro
